author: Nicole Blackmore
title: 'We have to pay £7,000 stamp duty to sell our shared ownership flat. Can we avoid it?'
text: 'We have to pay £7,000 stamp duty to sell our shared ownership flat. Can we avoid it?' Ask an expert: We look at the special tax relief available Some people in shared ownership schemes may face a stamp duty charge when they come to sell their property. Photo: Matt Cardy/Getty Images
